author: aloysius delvin
comment: This app sucks. Doesn't work fine and also its a trial version

author: Thesweetiger chun
comment: Pls add in the title is a trial  , it's misrepresentation of your apps forgetting this mention

reply.author: Pocketwood Ltd
reply.content: The first sentence of the description on Google play is "This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app"

title: Wrong title for this apps

author: jothy prakash
comment: Was struggling after losing my remote.. Bought a new phone and downloaded this app and better than HK remote app
title: Works for HK av receiver

author: Reid Mcgibbeny
comment: Been looking for a useful remote and finally saw this one. Works flawlessly. Thank you! Using on IR avr125
title: Hell yeah

author: Richard Rattanni
comment: For IR works better than HK's app.  Gotta older unit, AVR 247 and it worked first time.
title: IR worked great

reply.author: Pocketwood Ltd
reply.content:
The AVR 220 doesn't have ethernet or wi-fi so it can't be controlled by anything other than IR InfraRed. The Note 4 has an IR blaster and MyAV can use this to control devices. We've not tested it AVR220 as it's 13 years old and have made no claims that it does. So "1" star is unwarranted.
That said, did you try adding it as a IR device?

author: Anvoy Singh
comment: This is way better than harmon Kardon official app. HK app looks good visually but sucks at controlling the avr.

author: Hayim
title: Works w/ Hvr151, but visually need alot of work

author: J S
comment: Doesn't scale properly to screen size making it fiddly to use. Also no Bluetooth source for the AVR which is the main reason I wanted it.
title: Adequate

author: Dave Gardiner
comment: Would be excellent if it supported Android Wear so I could have at least volume controls on my watch.  ;)

reply.author: Pocketwood Ltd
reply.content:
Thanks for the good review.
MyAV does support Android Wear. You should see a blue MyAV logo on your watch. This should let you do the volume and input as well as control different devices.

title: Better than the official app

author: Doug Sinden
comment: When started it searched for network, no network devices in my house, so it gave me a bog standard control panel that didn't have anything to do with anything in my house? No manual selection

reply.author: Pocketwood Ltd
reply.content:
Yes, it will only work with certain Harman network devices, it says this in the description. Your tablet doesn't have an IR blaster than works with the Android IR framework, it only works with Sony's IR database.
There is a manual IP add option and with compatible IR blasters on Samsung and HTC products an IR control option.

title: Only network devices

author: Hyco Syco
comment: 7 day trial.  Not the HK AVR remote app I'm going use.  Uninstalled and using free HK AVR remote with great success.

reply.author: Pocketwood Ltd
reply.content: MyAV doesn't just control HK though. MyAV can control 1000s of other network and IR devices.
